# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="51310-102">Čuvanje poruka na Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51310-103">Nije moguće sačuvati poruke e-pošte na Outlook.com, ali ih možete odštampati u PDF koji možete sačuvati na vašem Računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51310-104">Uslužni program Microsoft štampati u PDF uključena u Windows 10 vam omogućava da odštampate bilo koju poruku e-pošte direktno u PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="51310-105">Izaberite poruku koju želite da sačuvate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="51310-106">Izaberite tri tačke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="51310-107">na vrhu poruke, a zatim izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="51310-108">**Odštampaj**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="51310-109">Ponovo izaberite **Print** i iz padajućeg menija štampač, izaberite **Microsoft Print u PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="51310-110">Izaberite **Print**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="51310-111">Unesite ime datoteke, zatim izaberite stavku **Sačuvaj**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51310-112">**Napomena:** Ovo se ne preporučuje na deljeni ili javni računarima kao i drugi korisnici mogli imati pristup bilo koji PDF-datoteka sačuvate sa PC računarom i ne izbrišete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="51310-113">Više informacija o štampanju, potražite [Štampanje e-poruke, prilozi, i kalendari u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="51310-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
